steps.name: Given  an author with ID 10 exists
And  an author with ID 12 does not exist
And  a book with ID 900 does not exist
When  I update the author with ID: 10, with New ID: 12, Book ID: 900, First Name: "John", Last Name: "Doe"
Then  the response status code should be 400
